languages.text: "Умение проницательно глядеть в сердце своего народа — великая добродетель для правителя, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Умение проницательно глядеть в сердце своего народа — великая добродетель для правителя, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: "The ability to see keenly into the hearts of one's people is a great virtue for a ruler to possess, Lord Captain."

languages.text: 「臣下の心情を熱心に理解する能力は、統治者にとっては大変な美徳となります、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "The ability to see keenly into the hearts of one's people is a great virtue for a ruler to possess, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「臣下の心情を熱心に理解する能力は、統治者にとっては大変な美徳となります、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: “洞察民意是统治者的伟大美德，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "The ability to see keenly into the hearts of one's people is a great virtue for a ruler to possess, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “洞察民意是统治者的伟大美德，舰长大人。”

languages.text: «La capacidad de leer los corazones de la gente es una gran virtud para un{mf||a} gobernante, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "The ability to see keenly into the hearts of one's people is a great virtue for a ruler to possess, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «La capacidad de leer los corazones de la gente es una gran virtud para un{mf||a} gobernante, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: « Être capable de lire dans le cœur de son peuple pour connaître ses désirs est une grande qualité pour un dirigeant, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "The ability to see keenly into the hearts of one's people is a great virtue for a ruler to possess, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Être capable de lire dans le cœur de son peuple pour connaître ses désirs est une grande qualité pour un dirigeant, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "Tief ins Herz des eigenen Volkes blicken zu können, zeichnet große Herrscher aus, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "The ability to see keenly into the hearts of one's people is a great virtue for a ruler to possess, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Tief ins Herz des eigenen Volkes blicken zu können, zeichnet große Herrscher aus, Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Halkının ne istediğini bilmek, hükümdarlığın yüce erdemlerindendir Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "The ability to see keenly into the hearts of one's people is a great virtue for a ruler to possess, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Halkının ne istediğini bilmek, hükümdarlığın yüce erdemlerindendir Lord Kaptan."
